span.style: padding: 0px; font-size: 14pt; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: inherit; color: inherit;

br.span: Gov. Noem has asked that schools remain closed for the rest of the 2019-20 school year. McLaughlin Schools will continue providing learning opportunities that are currently in place. McLaughlin Schools will also continue with our daily lunch program until further notice. The South Dakota Department of Education has also recommended to follow our current school calendar and to adhere to the end of school dates for students and staff. If you have any questions or concerns please call the Superintendent Office at 605-823-4484 or email Mr. Spencer at richard.spencer@k12.sd.us. Thanks for your understanding as we help support each other during this health crisis.
